term.title: bioreactor

item.text: An apparatus used to carry out any kind of bioprocess; examples include fermenter or enzyme reactor.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 148 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)

item.title: Wikipedia - ปฏิกรณ์ชีวภาพ (th)
